actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the congress with respect to the establishment of a Federal Audiovisual Procurement Office.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Administrator of the General Services Administration should report to Congress the results of a study to determine the practicability of the establishment of a Federal Audiovisual Procurement Office. Provides that such office would be responsible for allocating film production for the Federal Government to private industry.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the congress with respect to the establishment of a Federal Audiovisual Procurement Office.
